title: How to study for PYTHON? Is ppt enough?

comments.body:
Slides and notes is enough for the theory part. 

Practice writing codes because all the 4 markers in ISAs are related to writing entire codes. If I remember correctly they copy pasted a few questions directly from the slides.

Ya for theory PPT and notes are enough

But for 1M and 2M  you need to study out of the books.

I just heard kundavaiâ€™s classes 
And scoring S was simple
No you need to practice just to be sure you don't miss any syntax. Without that you probably will have a backlog. Even missing the smallest thing will make you lose marks.
